com.psddev.cms.db
Class Variation

java.lang.Object
  com.psddev.dari.db.Record
      com.psddev.cms.db.Variation
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.psddev.dari.db.Recordable, com.psddev.dari.util.HtmlObject, Cloneable, Comparable<com.psddev.dari.db.Record>
public class Variation
extends com.psddev.dari.db.Record

Changes objects based on rules.

Some of the uses of this class are: A/B testing, internationalization, and delivery of a different layout for mobile.
